group_1.textRight: Have you awakened?
It's embarrassing to hear you say that to my face...
I am a Magical Girl.
I noticed you were acting strangely, so I followed@to check on you.
As you were under the influence of a Witch,@I solved the problem.

group_1.textLeft: Don't tell me, this is what they were talking about@on Nightlife Homeroom...

group_1.textRight: As I thought, you heard about it from that show,@right?

group_1.textLeft: No, that stuff was just an urban legend, and this@has gotta be a cosplay, right...?

group_1.textRight: That's rude!
I am one of the Magical Girls who was witnessed@by Urara Yume!
What good would I gain from such a lie?
It's already embarrassing, for starters...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, yeah... I... I suddenly felt down.
Things I've been trying not to think about were@suddenly all running through my head.
And I felt bad about everyone, so I decided to die―@To die just like them...!

group_1.textRight: Calm yourself.
Those might have been your true feelings, but it@was the Witch who amplified those sentiments!
It targeted you when it observed your moment of@weakness, Kuroda.

group_1.textLeft: That's true... As bad as I did feel, I've never@considered dying...

group_1.textRight: Affirmative.
But that's why what we call Witches are a handful@to deal with,
driving people to the brink and extinguishing their@lives in such a way...

group_1.textLeft: Man, it's all suddenly sinking in...
And I don't think you're someone who'd lie about@being a Magical Girl, Miura...

group_1.textRight: Um, so...@I would be happy if you believed me.
I never expected for our existence to be revealed@through a broadcast, either...
Well, then, I will be on my way.
What is it?

group_1.textLeft: Once again, thank you for saving me.
